sentences.en: Adopt heating technology of semiconductor, have good temperature evenness.
sentences.cn: 采用热惯性极小的半导体微电热加热技术, 提高了温度均匀性.

sentences.en: Auto screen - leave device to guarantee the thickness and evenness of printing results.
sentences.cn: 自动离网装置,保证产品印刷的厚度与均匀度.

sentences.en: Diversity and evenness were apparently positive dependent, but diversity and simplicity were negative dependent.
sentences.cn: 多样度与均度呈显著的正相关, 与单纯度呈显著的负相关.

sentences.en: High efficiency light reflecting system and diffusion foil assure 95 % or more light evenness.
sentences.cn: 精心设计的光源反射系统再结合本机配的曝光散光片装置,从而使晒版光均匀%上.

sentences.en: Microbial inoculum could enhance microbial community functional diversity and evenness degree.
sentences.cn: 接种菌剂提高了微生物群落功能多样性和群落均匀度.

sentences.en: Pavement evenness is important for evaluation of high - grade highways .
sentences.cn: 路面平整度是评价 高等级公路 的一项重要指标.

sentences.en: So in the whole process of pesticide, maintain drug evenness is very important.
sentences.cn: 所以在整个施药过程中, 保持药物的均匀度是非常重要的.

sentences.en: Temperature - set, automatic control large heating area, quick heating - up, high evenness and timesaving.
sentences.cn: 温度设定自动控温,温度显示具有加热面积大 、 生温快 、 温度均匀、控温精确、省时省力.

sentences.en: The carding effects of card machine were evaluated with the web evenness.
sentences.cn: 从棉网均匀度的角度评定梳棉机梳理质量的优劣.

sentences.en: The concrete methods of improving cotton bale blending evenness are put forward.
sentences.cn: 提出了提高棉包混和均匀性的具体方法.

sentences.en: The species diversity indices and evenness were degraded to varying degrees.
sentences.cn: 多样性指数、均匀度指数均有不同程度的降低.

sentences.en: Used for reeling coarse yarn into prescribed length and measuring its evenness.
sentences.cn: 用于摇取棉、毛、绢、丝等条子和粗纱成规定长度.

sentences.en: Used for testing the evenness of sliver and roving.
sentences.cn: 用于检验条子及粗纱的条干均匀度.

sentences.en: Used for the test of the coarseness and evenness of coarse yarns.
sentences.cn: 用于测定棉条、粗纱在短片内的粗细均匀度情况.

sentences.en: Watch the Leaves in hot water, mainly the softness, color and evenness.
sentences.cn: 开汤后看冲泡后的叶底(茶渣), 主要看柔软度 、 色泽、匀度.

words.tran_cn: [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的
均匀地；平衡地；平坦地；平等地
变平；变得可比较；成为相等

trans.tran_cn: 平均，平等，平坦，平整度，匀度
